message.content:
{"id": "2940", "title": "Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor", "description": "When updating the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature, it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. This process should display a busy cursor to indicate that it is in progress.", "OB": "It takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown during this process.", "EB": "A busy cursor should be shown when updating the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature to indicate that it is in progress.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Navigate to the Export Zip feature.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose the desired file types.
5. Press ok to start the export process."}
